verse.analysis.analysis_tree.AnalysisTreeNode

class verse.analysis.analysis_tree.AnalysisTreeNode(trace={}, init={}, mode={}, static={}, uncertain_param={}, agent={}, height=0, assert_hits={}, child=[], start_time=0, ndigits=10, type='simtrace', id=0)

Bases: object

AnalysisTreeNode class A AnalysisTreeNode stores the continous execution of the system without transition happening

__init__(trace={}, init={}, mode={}, static={}, uncertain_param={}, agent={}, height=0, assert_hits={}, child=[], start_time=0, ndigits=10, type='simtrace', id=0)
trace: Dict

The trace for each agent. The key of the dict is the agent id and the value of the dict is simulated traces for each agent
